description:
While a girl named Hinako moves away, her Egg drops out from her package. Amu notices this and picks it up on her way to the Royal Garden. She, Kukai, and the Guardians discuss and decide to find the owner of the egg. While the rest of the Guardian Characters are asleep, Diamond awakes and appears as a projection and gives who is in the egg reassurance. The egg eventually hatches to reveal Kiran, Hinako`s Guardian Character.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 届け! キランの思い!
